name: GetOut Beta Version 1.0.0
description:
Explore a world inside a computer. But beware of the virus!

You are a virtual anitvirus assistant of User (The protagonist), tring to destroy a computer virus with your help. But the Unknown Viruslord(The main antagonist) tries to stop you to in succeeding.

Warning: This is a VERY unfinshed beta version of the game.

You can report bugs in the Comment section.
